restaurants_bars.name: The Clevelander Bar & Grill
restaurants_bars.description: A popular sports bar known for its lively atmosphere and proximity to the FieldHouse, offering a wide range of pub fare.

restaurants_bars.name: Lola Bistro
restaurants_bars.description: Owned by celebrity chef Michael Symon, offering high-end New American cuisine in a chic setting.

restaurants_bars.name: Bar 32
restaurants_bars.description: An upscale lounge located in the Hilton, offering stunning views of Lake Erie along with craft cocktails and small plates.

accommodations.name: Hilton Cleveland Downtown
accommodations.description: Modern hotel with lake views, an indoor pool, and a rooftop bar, located within walking distance to the FieldHouse.

accommodations.name: Drury Plaza Hotel Cleveland Downtown
accommodations.description: Comfortable accommodations in a renovated historic building, offering free breakfast and evening snacks.

tourist_attractions.name: Rock & Roll Hall of Fame
tourist_attractions.address: 1100 Rock and Roll Blvd, Cleveland, OH 44114
tourist_attractions.description: Iconic museum documenting the history of rock music, with a vast collection of artifacts and interactive exhibits.

tourist_attractions.name: Cleveland Museum of Art
tourist_attractions.description: Renowned for its significant art collections spanning 6,000 years, offering free admission to the public.

team_related_activities.name: Cavaliers Team Shop
team_related_activities.description: Official store for Cleveland Cavaliers merchandise, located within the Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse.

options.description: The Greater Cleveland Regional Transit Authority (RTA) offers multiple bus and rail lines that connect to the FieldHouse, including a HealthLine and Red Line Rapid Transit.
Free trolley services are available in downtown Cleveland, offering an easy way to get to the FieldHouse from various downtown locations.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner offering authentic Cavaliers tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: Reliable secondary marketplace that offers verified resold Cavaliers tickets.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Buying tickets during the mid-week can often be cheaper than weekend games. Group ticket discounts often apply for groups of 10 or more. Some games may have last-minute ticket sales closer to the game day.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from verified sources to avoid scams. If buying on the secondary market, ensure the website offers buyer guarantee. Avoid buying printed tickets from individuals on site as these can be duplicates or forgeries.
